vendor_name: Bells at Killcare Boutique Hotel, Restaurant and Spa
title: Boutique Central Coast Retreat with Gourmet Dining & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Discover Hamptons-style glamour and relaxation at the five-star Bells at Killcare Boutique Hotel, Restaurant & Spa on the New South Wales Central Coast. Unplug from the everyday with a high-end boutique escape in a natural paradise, where pristine beaches and bays meet the Bouddi National Park.

Indulge in daily cooked breakfast made with the freshest produce from the hotel's own garden, a delicious antipasto platter to share and a nightly house cocktail each. Top it all off with A$50 food and drinks credit per person to spend at the hotel's chef-hatted restaurant and a leisurely 12pm checkout.
location_description: Bells at Killcare Boutique Hotel, Restaurant & Spa

vendor_name: Bells at Killcare Boutique Hotel, Restaurant and Spa
title: Hamptons-Inspired Central Coast Villas & Lodges with Daily Breakfast & Oyster Tour Upgrades Available
description:
Embrace Hamptons-style elegance at this five-star retreat on the New South Wales Central Coast. Unplug from the everyday with a high-end escape in a natural paradise, where several sparkling beaches and bays meet the Bouddi National Park.

The experience here is truly boutique - start each day with a farm-to-table breakfast at The Wild Flower Bar & Dining, featuring fresh produce from the hotel’s own garden. Between the soothing treatments at Bells Day Spa and the hotel’s 20-metre lap pool, pool bar, yoga and pilates offerings and wine tasting with the in-house sommelier, you’ll slip effortlessly into a rhythm of relaxation.

Whether you retreat to the peaceful villas or the spacious family lodges, this sanctuary offers a true back-to-nature experience. Just 90 minutes from Sydney’s CBD, Bells at Killcare Boutique Hotel, Restaurant & Spa is the perfect base to explore scenic bushwalking trails or ride the waves at iconic Killcare Beach.
location_description: Bells at Killcare Boutique Hotel, Restaurant & Spa
offer_address: 107 The Scenic Road, Killcare Heights, New South Wales 2251, Australia

vendor_name: Bells at Killcare Boutique Hotel, Restaurant and Spa
title: Boutique Foodies' Escape Near Sydney
description: If you need a touch of Hamptons-style glamour and relaxation in your life, look no further: Bells at Killcare Boutique Hotel, Restaurant & Spa is the place for you! Forget the rest of the world and unplug from the everyday, with this high-end boutique getaway in a natural paradise. Indulge in daily cooked breakfast made with the freshest produce from the hotel's own garden, a delicious antipasto platter to share, a welcome house cocktail each, and a bottle of wine on arrival. Top it all off with AU$50 food and beverage credit per person to spend at the hotel's multi-award-winning, Chef's Hatted restaurant and a leisurely check-out at 12pm.
location_description: Bells at Killcare Boutique Hotel, Restaurant & Spa
